price: 148. Entonces Al-lah les concedió la recompensa de esta vida y la excelente recompensa de la otra. Y Al-lah ama a quienes hacen el bien.
arabic: فَـَٔاتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ثَوَابَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَحُسۡنَ ثَوَابِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۗ وَٱللَّهُ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: faātāhumu al-lahu thawāba al-dun'yā waḥus'na thawābi al-ākhirati wal-lahu yuḥibbu al-muḥ'sinīna
